original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 321.50/323.00 to the US dollar, bond yields down
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 321.50/323.00 to the US dollar on Tuesday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 321.00/323.00 to the US dollar on Monday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted down at 13.05/15 after closing on Monday at 13.20/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted down at 13.30/35 after closing at 13.40/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted down at 14.25/30 after closing at 14.35/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted down at 14.35/45 percent up from closing at 14.55/70 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted down at 15.85/16.00 percent after closing at 15.90/16.05 percent. (Colombo/Aug08/2023)
